name: Tiny Crazy Truck
description:
Hey Mad Trucker! Are you sick and tired of being on the road all day? Does your job have you stressed? Well get to Trucking. Jump on the highway and take on incoming traffic as you smash your way down the Road to Freedom. Gain points for every car you bump off the road but watch out for the Police or you'll get busted for driving like a madman.

- HOW TO PLAY -

-Tap the screen left and right to swerve from side to side

-Smash all Cars, Busses, and Ambulances to increase your score

-Dodge the police or you'll get Busted!

Thanks for playing.
